    Megatron looked at the imposter from head to toe. It turns out Nighteyes 
wasnt wrong.....
    "Well, I like to see my former minions carring on my legacy. But I think 
you might have over done it." He trailed off and then lost his smile. "And 
how do you plan on using it?" For the moment, he held in his pure hate and 
rage.
